info.title: API ruta99 v1
info.description:
This is the documentation for the public API v1 of ruta99.

## First steps

1.  Ask for a dedicated developers organization for your company. This will act as a sandbox.
2.  The ruta99 team will provide a `client_id` and `client_secret`.
3.  Use this credentials to generate the access tokens.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: The API uses the flow of client credentials based on OAuth 2.0 as an authorization mechanism.

post.summary: Get access token with client credenciales
